metadata.title: Exxon Coastline - EVOS Database

creators.name: Exxon, Alaska Department of Natural Resources, USDC Forest Service, Chugach National Forest

metadata.description: Data Type: Exxon Valdez Oil Spill;  The digital shoreline produced by EXXON through the use of a local mapping firm. This dataset is the 1:60,000 air photo update to the state shoreline produced by USFS and DNR at a scale of 1:63,360 using the coastline from USGS 1: 63360 map series and 1:31,360 timbertype map base. The intended use of this dataset was to provide an accurate, detailed, and updated shoreline for use in resource mapping and analysis for the EVOS damage assessment and restoration efforts, that would be used by all agencies working in the spill effected area.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Unknown

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Unknown

Use constraints: Photos are not synchronized with tides. Land water interfaces can vary considerably from adopted standards of mean high water. The contractor did provide a datum which approximated mean high water.
